snippet.title: We Were Here - Too | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
We Were Here Too, the sequel to the co-op puzzle game 'We Were Here', is a brain-breaking new adventure in the forgotten halls of Castle Rock, Antarctica, which will officially release on 02-02-2018.

You are now able to pre-order the game on http://www.totalmayhemgames.com/preorder

You and your expedition companions got separated from each other. You know what happened to you, but what happened to the two you got separated from? What happened to them, what is their side of the story? 

In this video, we will explain the gameplay and mechanics of We Were Here Too.

Official Website: http://www.totalmayhemgames.com/
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/WeWereHereGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wewereheregame
Instagram: TotalMayhemGames
Steam Group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/WWHO
